Chicken wings prices have come down in price since soaring last year, Wingstop chief executive Michael Skipworth told CNBC's Jim Cramer on Wednesday.

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Survey shows Netflix is losing more long-term subscribers - The Verge
articles.description: According to survey data reported by The Information, subscribers who’ve been with the service for over three years made up 13 percent of total cancellations last quarter.
articles.content:
Users subscribed to Netflix for more than three years represented 13 percent of total cancellations
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
